original_text: And as they departed, Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John, What went ye out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken with the wind?
korean_text: 그들이 떠나매 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 대하여 말씀하시되 너희가 무엇을 보려고 광야에 나갔더냐 바람에 흔들리는 갈대냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus began to say unto the multitudes
What went ye out into the wilderness to see?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 광야에 나가 보려고 무엇을 보았더냐

sentences.original_text: A reed shaken with the wind?
